name: Giaohangtietkiem.vn
tagline: In F, we believe: Fast, Flexible, Friendly
description:
At GHTK, we place people at the core of all activities with a view to nurture each individual?s talent. Not only do we promise to create a transparent environment for everyone, but we also give you the best opportunity to prove your ability and achieve promotion in the career path. It is crucial to discover and maximize your own qualities; thence bring out the best of you.

In order to create a workplace for young talents with ?Zero Spirit? inside, here at GHTK, all candidates are always welcome to join us! The group of GHTK Talents are proud to be intelligent and energetic with a dynamic passion!

You will find updated information and images of daily life at GHTK head offices both located in Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City. Hope you can have the most truthfully and completed view regarding working environment as well as job opportunities available at GHTK head offices.
